attributes.action: To keep HM Queen EIIR in our passports and it not be replaced by Pan-European Superstate!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is rumour that Her Majesty to be replaced by the word EUROPE in our British passports. If this happens; Britons both Republican and Monarchist would be devistated, this international organisation is sucking up our British freedoms; withdraw or don't withdraw, just dont let this happen. THIS CAN NOT HAPPEN!!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
